message.raw:
Use set() to add GAZEBO_CXX_FLAGS to CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS

CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS is a variable, not a list. So append needs to be done with
spaces, whereas list(APPEND ) would add a semicolon and break the build if
CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS already contains something.

message:
